txt.en: 'One of the scouts brought back a few pieces of parchment they found scattered around Elderslade. They seem to be part of an account recording a study into the strange crystals. Perhaps if you locate the rest, we might unlock the secrets of the stones and discover their creator.'
'The missing pages may help us understand what has happened to these fell stones, and their purpose.'
Bring your findings to Mother Amma

From across the wasted lands of Elderslade you have gathered the missing pages of the Crystal Journal, as well as the sorceress' new records.\n\nBring your findings to Mother Amma in the forge at Annâk-khurfu.
Lost pages from the journal of an Angmarim sorceress are scattered across Elderslade.
Collected the Crystal Journal's first page

DNT - From across the wasted lands of Elderslade you have gathered the missing pages of the Crystal Journal, as well as the sorceress' new records. They detail how a mysterious spell cast on the Sarrowstones has the ability to make Wargs even more deadly and vicious. And mad. There are still many questions, and the answers seem to lie deep in the bowels of Gundabad.
Collected the Crystal Journal's second page
Collected the Crystal Journal's third page
Collected the Crystal Journal's fourth page
Collected the Crystal Journal's fifth page
Collected the Crystal Journal's sixth page
Collected the Crystal Journal's seventh page
Collected the Crystal Journal's eighth page
Collected the Crystal Journal's ninth page
Lost pages from the Crystal Journal can be found across Elderslade.\n\nYou should look for more pages from the Crystal Journal.
Collected the Crystal Journal's tenth page

'You have found more pages from the journal? Excellent! Give them here and let us see what we have.'

You hand Mother Amma the pages and the new journal. Her brow furrows as she reads through them quickly.

'A mysterious spell cast on the sarrowstones makes Wargs even more deadly and vicious... and mad. It is good that you defeated Brágha before she could share her discoveries or find a way to use the crystals on anyone or anything else. 

'Give me a moment....'

Mother Amma shuffles the pages, putting them into order then putting them into the new journal. She hands the new crystal journal to you.

'What a wicked person! It is a shame we know not what she found after following her superior into the darkness. There are still many questions, but the answers seem to lie deep in the bowels of Gundabad. Well, we have plans to be there soon, my friend. I have ordered the pages for you.'
